CustomField.description: The API name of the field on the Project object you want to use to calculate the value in the % Hours Completed For Recognition field. If required, you can create your own field and add it to the picklist.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select the API name of the field on the Project object you want to use to calculate the value in the % Hours Completed For Recognition field. If required, you can create your own field and add it to the picklist.
CustomField.label: Total Hours Field on Project
